miniapp.name: The Stack
miniapp.subtitle: Community Tower Building Game
miniapp.description: Build the community tower brick by brick with players from around the world. Place colorful blocks, compete on leaderboards, and watch the tower grow together!
miniapp.ogTitle: The Stack - Community Tower Building Game
miniapp.ogDescription: Build the community tower brick by brick with players from around the world. Place colorful blocks, compete on leaderboards, and watch the tower grow together!
